titles.title: MEGOBARI Act
Mobilizing and Enhancing Georgia’s Options for Building Accountability, Resilience, and Independence Act
MEGOBARI Act
Mobilizing and Enhancing Georgia’s Options for Building Accountability, Resilience, and Independence Act
MEGOBARI Act
A bill to support democracy and the rule of law in Georgia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Risch without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 55.

committee.name: Senate Foreign Relations
